channel.title: Predictive Analytics on Orange
channel.description: Recent content in Predictive Analytics on Orange

item.title: Data Mining for Political Scientists
item.description: Being a political scientist, I did not even hear about data mining before I’ve joined Biolab. And naturally, as with all good things, data mining started to grow on me. Give me some data, connect a bunch of widgets and see the magic happen! But hold on! There are still many social scientists out there who haven’t yet heard about the wonderful world of data mining, text mining and machine learning.

item.title: Making Predictions
item.description: One of the cool things about being a data scientist is being able to predict. That is, predict before we know the actual outcome. I am not talking about verifying your favorite classification algorithm here, and I am not talking about cross-validation or classification accuracies or AUC or anything like that. I am talking about the good old prediction. This isÂ where our very own Predictions widget comes to help.
